department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.title: Readings in Cultural Studies
course.meeting_text: W., 3-6 with two additional hours to be arranged
course.description: Selected readings in contemporary Korean on topics in art, film, drama, and cultural studies, supplemented by selections from audio-visual media on traditional and current cultural events. After completion of Korean 150a and 150b, students are expected to be able to participate in most formal and informal conversations on practical, social, professional, and abstract topics and read with almost complete comprehension and at normal speed expository prose on unfamiliar subjects and a variety of literary texts.
